name: English
headerTitle:
Easy way to learn languages
The context you love is the best tutor!
headerSubtitle: Try our app and enjoy learning
contentPleasure: You can find lessons on favourite Youtube channel or Netflix show. Every article you read is full of new words and expressions. Fullfill your vocabulary with expressions that matter to you.
contentMemory: Training is based on materials that you love and enjoy. We use context exactly from the video and articles you watched. Translation depends on context so you shouldn’t learn everything at once.
contentOurApp: Easylang is a FREE extention for your browser and training app for web and mobile.
FirstBlockBookQuestion: Is there is a book that you want to read, but it is only in English?
FirstBlockMovieQuestion: Want to see the movie in the original?
FirstBlockNewsQuestion: Need to be up to date, but news language is too complicated?
FirstBlockMusicQuestion:
Everyone loves music!
But what is your favorite song about?
FirstBlockBonusText: Supplement your vocabulary with a specially designed simulator!
motivationText:
We help with additional
motivation — you choose
the context yourself
thirdBlockText_1: It is easy to train anytime and on any device
thirdBlockText_2: You can learn with your favourite book, film or even blogger
thirdBlockText_3: Our Context-Tutor suggests to repeat words in exact context you met them
feedbackFirstText: Thanks for your extension! Now I know what Ed Sheeran sings about!
feedbackSecondText: I tried to read Marvel in the original. And it's possible! And moreover - the meaning is often different, and now I know it!
feedbackThirdText: Thanks for your Tutor! Reading what I like and learning is the perfect combination!
feedbackFourthText: I love Jane Austen! I started reading it in the original thanks to your extension! Thanks!
feedbackFifthText: It’s important in my industry to get news quickly - thanks to Easylang I can keep up with the others!
feedbackSixthText: Now I can help my child to do homework! It brings us great!
blogFirstText: 30 useful words from Game of Thrones
blogSecondText: How to choose a book to learn language and not to lose?
blogThirdText: What journalists read if they need to navigate in the recent world news?
blog: To find some tips and learn more about Easylang visit
contentSource: Choose anything you like and explore new words and expressions. We recommend to try Easylang with Youtube, Netflix, all online magazines, blogs and your school materials.
musicParagraph: Find out what your favourite song is about
bookParagraph: Read classic and modern literature in original
PagesHeader: We help to learn the language with pleasure!
AboutPageFirstParagraph:
- to study English absolutely free!
- to study your favorite content;
- our Apps are available on any device;
- to study English anytime and anywhere.
AboutPageSecondParagraph:
EasyLang was launched in January 2020, and since then, a lot of people have been given the opportunity to study content that was previously unavailable to them. In our work, we strive to provide training experience that meets your needs and helps to achieve life goals.

We pay attention to the opinions of our consumers, and are always glad to receive a feedback from them. You can contact us by e-mail: ideas@easylang.by.
AboutPageThirdParagraph:
We help to learn the language for free and comfortably, doing what you love - watching TV shows, reading books, or listening to music. In order to start you need:
- to install a browser extension
- to create an account in the tutor to work on the content you are interested in.

Our products available here.
AboutPageFourthParagraph: We don't impose content on you - You choose it yourself. If you are not sure where to start, check out our recommendations.
ProductsPageTopText:
We help to learn the language for free and comfortably, doing what you love - watching TV shows, reading books, or listening to music.
In order to start you need:
- to install a browser extension
- to create an account in the tutor to work on the content you are interested in.
ExtensionDescription:
— works in Google Chrome
— translates everything you need
ContextTutorDescription:
— helps to refresh known words
— helps to learn new ones
ProductsPageBottomText:
Still have questions?
Watch our video how to install our products or contact us - we will surely help you!
